text:
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
November 21, 1956
Dr. Burton Paulu
Director, Region 4 NAKB
KUOM
Univeraity of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
Dear Burton:
November 26 week seems o.k. by me and by
Skornia, and we assume you111 show up here on November
26. It would seem to me—today—that Monday is as
good a day as any. I canft tell too far in my life,
anyhow. On top of labor negotiations which often
take my evenings on short notice.
My representation of JCET doeen*t end
until next April, so don*t know that there is any
hurry on that particular matter. I assume it will
be on the Paulu-SchooXey-8kornla~Hill-NAKB agenda
while you are here, anyway.
Best regards.
Sincerely,
Frank E. Schooley
FES;frah
cc: H. J. Skornia
P.S. If you*11 advise we*11 arrange room...fee
